tags.name: share
tags.description: Provides access to collective and page shares.

tags.name: collective_user_settings
tags.description: Provides access to user settings for a specific collective.

tags.name: session
tags.description: Provides access to collectives user sessions. Sessions are used to track active users/clients in a collective, e.g. to notify about updates.

tags.name: settings
tags.description: Provides access to the following user settings used by the collectives app. - user_folder: Path where collectives are mounted in user home directory.
